body.p: This map tests the processing of relationship tables in combination of systems of maps and submaps.

Topic 01 and Topic 02 are included by the top-level map. Topics 03 and 04 are included by submap-01 and submap-02 respectively. Topic 03 is related to Topic 01 and Topic 04 by a reltable in the top-level map. Topics and 01 and 02 are related by a reltable in submap-01.
body.note: You should never use a relatable in one map to relate topics that are not known to that map or to maps subordinate to it, not because it's a processing problem, but because there is presumption that maps and submaps represent a hierarchy of dependencies such that subordinate maps should not have dependencies on maps or topics that are not subordinate to them.
